title: Meta log
description: Each entry provides metadata for a single entry of self-tracking data.

version_id.description: changes each time the entry's value(s) change.

last_updated.description: records the last date and time when the entry's value(s) changed

mode_description.description: describes how the entry was recorded e.g. device, manual entry

collector_id.description: the id of the person or object who provided the data
